entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is horrified by what he sees.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who is commanding and whimpering, and is about to do something with a dagger.

relationships.description: Harry watches as Wormtail commands and whimpers.
Wormtail addresses Harry, saying 'Flesh — of the servant  — w-willingly given  — you will  — revive — your master.'
Wormtail holds a long, thin, shining silver dagger in his left hand.
